workshoptitle: Using Alarms and Detection Rules with OCI Logging Analytics

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Alarms and Detection Rules

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a Label
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a label

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a Parser
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a Parser

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create a Source
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a source

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Upload a File
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to upload a log file from local desktop to OCI console.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create and Trigger a Ingest Time Detection Rule
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create and trigger a ingest time detection rule

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Create a Scheduled Search Detection Rule
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a scheduled search detection rule

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Create and Verify an Alarm
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create and verify an Alarm

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Oracle Database Abnormal Termination
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create an 'Abnormal Termination' Detection Rule & alarms from it

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Sensitive Configuration and Privilege Escalation
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a custom label and conditionally attach it to logs & alarms from it

tutorials.title: Lab 12: Suspicious Activity and Data Exfiltration
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to create a Saved Search and attach it to a Scheduled Detection Rule & alarms from it

tutorials.title: Lab 13: DNS Exfiltration on Windows Systems
tutorials.description: This lab uses labels and SST to identify DNS exfiltration attempts.

tutorials.title: Lab 14: Sensitive Data Access from Threat Tagged Location
tutorials.description: This lab explains how to create multi-conditional labels, and OOTB Threat score enrichment.

tutorials.title: Lab 15: Problem Labels for Custom Apps-Logs
tutorials.description: This lab explains how to create problem labels, EFDs, and new-fields using eval/extract for a cusom log.

tutorials.title: Lab 16: Unsuccessful Food Orders
tutorials.description: This lab explains the guided regex parser creation flow to create single and multi-parser

tutorials.title: Lab 17: Logs from DB Tables
tutorials.description: This lab explains how to create a DB table log-source.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
